meanings.sent1: The workers will repave the driveway next week.
meanings.sent2: It is necessary to repave the sidewalk to make it smooth again.
meanings.sent3: Why did the road go to therapy? To repave its troubles away!
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to repave the rough path of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays gently repave the earth with warmth each morning.

meanings.definition: To cover a road or path with a new layer of pavement
meanings.sent1: The city will repave the street to fix the potholes.
meanings.sent2: Contractors repave the highway every few years to maintain its quality.
meanings.sent3: Why did the math book need a new cover? To repave its knowledge!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed helped her repave her own path to success.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush seemed to repave the canvas with vibrant colors.
